citeinfo.origin: Resource Ecology and Fisheries Management Division (REFM), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
citeinfo.title: Groundfish catch and Composition - U.S. Observer Program

descript.abstract:
Catch quantity and composition from sampling conducted aboard commercial fishing vessels (US and foreign) in the EEZ off Alaska
Observers sample aboard all vessels greater than 60' LOA fishing Groundfish within the EEZ off Alaska. Set-by-set data is not generally available for reasons of confidentiality. Data aggregated into ï¾½ degree lat by 1 degree long generally available upon request
US EEZ off Alaska. Some data also collected during commercial fisheries for pacific hake off Washington and Oregon
A TCODE project

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
